thread.title: Mice Women Sing, Dance, and Flee From a Giant Cat in a Japanese Laptop Commercial
thread.title_full: Mice Women Sing, Dance, and Flee From a Giant Cat in a Japanese Laptop Commercial

author: Glen Tickle
title: Mice Women Sing, Dance, and Flee From a Giant Cat in a Japanese Laptop Commercial
text:
Members of the group Nogizaka46 star as mice women who sing, dance, and flee from a giant cat in a Japanese ad campaign for Mouse Computers Japan .


via reddit
